# Section 1: Data Manipulation

## Setup

```{r libraries, include = F}
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(plyr)
library(patchwork)
```

```{r opts chunk}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(tidy.opts=list(width.cutoff=60))

knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
options(
  ggplot2.continuous.colour = "viridis",
  ggplot2.continuous.fill = "viridis"
)
```
